description: Outstanding actions for Orbis product roadmap, Sub-App reconciliation, and strategic planning

outstandingActions.title: Product Roadmap Update to oApp
outstandingActions.detail: Populate Orbis Dashboard with the unified product roadmap including Orbis Intelligence, Orbis Forge, Complize, and Sub-Apps. Each project should include full phase structure and step breakdown for SDLC alignment.
requiredActions: Confirm canonical list of Sub-Apps and Projects
Attach all phases and steps with IDs and metadata
Link to memory anchors for roadmap visibility

outstandingActions.title: OF Strategic Planning Handover
outstandingActions.detail: Complete merge of Orbis Forge, Orbis Intelligence, and Sub-App tracking into a single 3D-printer-style roadmap in oApp. Ensure CSV from Sub-App reconciliation is ingested and all project links established.

impactIfNotCompleted: Fragmented product roadmap, unclear strategic priorities, Sub-App reconciliation gaps

recommendedPhaseSteps.title: Canonical Sub-App and Project List Confirmation
